subject: Re: Ovilus question and feed back needed PLEASE
author: Somewhere in time.
full_text:
I just purchased both of them. As They have not arrived and will not
arrive until at least OCT 4th (Bill is backed up with orders.) I can't
comment on how well either of them work yet. I will as soon as they
get here. I say hey try them out... if they don't work for you
somebody will buy them off ebay. It would beat having to wait for
months till Bill can get some more made.

 Alex 




--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "juswitchy" <Alwaysguess@...> wrote:
>
> Was jus wondering what you all thought of the Ovilus and the puck? I 
> was really thinking of buying one and was jus looking for feed back or 
> a tip on something better..
> 
> 
> Blessed Be

> Jus~Witchy
